unnormalised: Flash sales, right? Total "DDLJ" vibes – you gotta act fast! I saw a saree on Myntra once, gone in minutes! It's like trying to book a tatkal ticket on IRCTC. Is it even real, ya? Maybe they just *say* its a flash sale. Still, I got some cool stuff during Diwali sale last year. Worth trying, but Lakshmi ji bless you with speed!
